title: TheCryptoMom
author: TheCryptoMom
created_time: June 30, 2023, 01:20:40 PMLast edit: June 30, 2023, 02:55:47 PM by TheCryptoMom
content: Selling one extra iPhone 14 Pro gold 512GB my husband got from his work. Selling it here so I can start my own stay at home mom trading journey with the Bitcoin    Asking price 800euro so 0.028Bitcoin  Own a second-hand, brand-new iPhone 14 Max Gold with 512GB storage at an unbeatable price. This sleek and sophisticated device combines stunning design with unparalleled performance. With its pristine condition, it offers the latest iOS, advanced camera capabilities, and a vibrant Super Retina display. You'll have ample space to store your memories, music, videos, and apps. Enjoy luxury and innovation with the assurance of our quality inspection. Upgrade your mobile experience today and stand out from the crowd. Don't miss this extraordinary opportunity to indulge in technology, style, and affordability. Grab it now before it's gone!

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: You should probably use an escrow for this transaction since there are many scammers on this board.

comments.author: alterra57
